meanings.definition: Two people who jointly hold the position of chairperson.
meanings.sent1: The cochairpersons led the meeting together.
meanings.sent2: The cochairpersons worked collaboratively to make decisions.
meanings.sent3: At the event, the cochairpersons wore matching hats.
meanings.sent4: The cochairpersons were like two peas in a pod, always in sync.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cochairpersons standing side by side was powerful.

meanings.definition: The act of serving as cochairpersons.
meanings.sent1: Their cochairpersonship was a model of teamwork.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, their cochairpersonship kept things running smoothly.
meanings.sent4: Their cochairpersonship was a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The success of the project was attributed to their cochairpersonship.
